mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hope for a Speedy Recovery from Illness for Commander Dr. C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Resolution by the local Confederate Veterans Camp for sympathy and hope for a speedy recovery from illness for their Commander, Dr. C. M. Stigleman, signed B. Bishop Lieut. Commander and N. J. Agnew Adj., January 19, 1905, handwritten. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
